class gstManipulator

Base class for PHANToM manipulator class.

From header file: gstManipulator.h

Constructors and Destructors
~gstManipulatorDestructor.
gstManipulatorThis class is intended as a base class only, the constructor is protected so that instances can not be created.
Functions
getInvertStylusSwitch
getNode Get node that manipulator modifies.
isActive Returns TRUE if manip is currently active.
setInvertStylusSwitch If TRUE then the inverse value of the stylus switch is used to activate the manipulator.
setNode Set "newNode" to be the node in the scene that the manipulator modifies.
setUseStylusSwitch Set whether the stylus switch is used to start and stop manipulators.
Virtual Functions
calcManipulatorForce

stopFor extension:
Data Members
protected
gstBoolean active;For extension: TRUE if manipulator is active.
gstBoolean invertStylusSwitch;
gstBoolean last_active;
gstTransform* manipNode;For extension: Pointer to node to be manipulated.
gstPoint manipStuckPos;
gstBoolean useStylusSwitch;For extension: TRUE if stylus switch is to be used.
